content.text: I'll update the ReportingCycles page to highlight the "Verify UL 360 Upload" button on step 9 of the demo. Let me first find where this button is located:
Let me read that section of the ReportingCycles page:
Perfect! I can see the button already has the highlighting logic for step 6. I need to update it to also highlight for step 9. Let me update this:

input.old_string:
<Button
                          variant="primary"
                          onClick={() => handleVerify(true)}
                          disabled={selectedCycle.exceptionCounts.meter > 0 || selectedCycle.exceptionCounts.data > 0}
                          data-demo="verify-upload"
                          className={isDemoMode && currentStep === 6 ? 'ring-4 ring-yellow-300 ring-offset-2 animate-pulse' : ''}
                        >
                          <CheckCircle className="w-4 h-4 mr-2" />
                          Verify UL 360 Upload
                        </Button>
input.new_string:
<Button
                          variant="primary"
                          onClick={() => handleVerify(true)}
                          disabled={selectedCycle.exceptionCounts.meter > 0 || selectedCycle.exceptionCounts.data > 0}
                          data-demo="verify-upload"
                          className={isDemoMode && (currentStep === 6 || currentStep === 9) ? 'ring-4 ring-yellow-300 ring-offset-2 animate-pulse' : ''}
                        >
                          <CheckCircle className="w-4 h-4 mr-2" />
                          Verify UL 360 Upload
                        </Button>

content.text: Now let me verify the build is successful:

input.description: Build the project to verify changes

content.text:
Perfect! The build completed successfully. Let me create a summary of the changes:

## Summary of Changes

I've successfully updated the "Verify UL 360 Upload" button to highlight on both step 6 and step 9 of the demo.

### Changes Made:

#### **Updated ReportingCycles Page** (`/home/node/txai-projects/project/src/pages/ReportingCycles.tsx`):

**Button Highlight Update (line 347-356):**
- Updated the className condition from `currentStep === 6` to `(currentStep === 6 || currentStep === 9)`
- The button now displays the yellow pulsing ring highlight on both:
  - **Step 6**: First verification after resolving initial exceptions
  - **Step 9**: Final verification after bulk resolving meter exceptions and confirming unusual values

### How It Works:

**Demo Flow with Highlights:**
- **Step 6 - Verify Upload Success**: 
  - February cycle is auto-selected
  - "Verify UL 360 Upload" button is highlighted with `ring-4 ring-yellow-300 ring-offset-2 animate-pulse`
  - First verification attempt (triggers the error simulation showing 2 new exceptions)

- **Step 9 - Final Verification**:
  - February cycle is auto-selected (from previous update)
  - "Verify UL 360 Upload" button is highlighted with the same yellow pulsing ring
  - Final verification after all exceptions have been resolved
  - This verification should succeed and complete the cycle

The highlighting pattern is consistent across both steps, making it clear to the demo presenter which button to click at each stage of the workflow.
